title: Up against the system
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Canada - Politics and government

description: People on welfare are rarely heard. What do they go through? How do they feel? How do concerned social and welfare workers feel about the welfare system? What is welfare supposed to do? In this film, welfare recipients and social case workers talk about the problems of being "up against the system."
